column1: #Text=We 've got ta get out of here !
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Azula says : " You mean it 's not obvious yet ?
#Text=I am about to celebrate becoming an only child !
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't get him to go in there !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , there 's no way we can fly out of here .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 'll have to find a way !
#Text=" Sokka says : " We need to split up .
#Text=Take the tunnel and get to the stolen airship .
#Text=The Fire Nation ca n't separate our family again !
#Text=" Toph says : " I can clear that away and we can fly out through there !
#Text=" Suki says : " Um , there 's an awful lot of fire in that general direction ... " Aang says : " We 'll get through .
